scripts.setup:
composer install && npm install && php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" && php artisan key:generate --ansi && php -r "function readEnvVar($key, $default) { $file = file_get_contents('.env'); preg_match('/' . $key . '=([^
]+)/', $file, $matches); return isset($matches[1]) ? $matches[1] : $default; } $db = readEnvVar('DB_DATABASE', 'revalio'); $host = readEnvVar('DB_HOST', '127.0.0.1'); $port = readEnvVar('DB_PORT', '3306'); $username = readEnvVar('DB_USERNAME', 'root'); $password = readEnvVar('DB_PASSWORD', ''); try { $conn = new PDO('mysql:host='.$host.';port='.$port, $username, $password); $conn->exec('CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `'.$db.'`'); echo 'Database '.$db.' berhasil dibuat/diperiksa.
'; } catch (Exception $e) { echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage() . '
'; }" && php artisan migrate:fresh --seed --force && npm run dev
